You must enable cookies in order to continue.

  1. In order to use this application, you must enable cookies for this site in your browser. Please consult your browser's Help files for instructions about how to enable cookies.

For Firefox, follow these steps to enable cookies:

  1. From the menu bar, select Tools > Options. The Options dialog box will open.
  2. Select Privacy in the left pane.
  3. Select Cookies in the right pane. The Cookies options will expand.
  4. Select Allow sites to set cookies.
  5. Click OK.

For Internet Explorer, follow these steps to enable cookies:

  1. From the menu bar, select Tools > Internet Options.
  2. Select the Privacy tab.
  3. Drag the slider to reduce your settings to Medium.
  4. Click OK.

If you are seeing this screen, it means you have successfully installed the Solstice Application Framework, but there are no applications installed. The Solstice Download page is a good place to look for applications to install.

If you're wondering where to go from here, please visit our documentation page, or visit us in #solstice on irc.freenode.net.

  • Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.01 and up for Windows.
  • Netscape Navigator 6.x and 7.x for any operating system.
  • Netscape 8.x and up for Windows
  • Mozilla Firefox 0.8 and up for any operating system
  • Safari for Macintosh OS X and up
For Netscape 8, please change the rendering engine for this site to Mozilla Firefox. To change the rendering engine, follow these steps:
  1. On the menu bar, select View > Rendering Engine > Display Page Like Firefox.
Or,
  1. Click the browser icon in the status bar at the bottom left of the window. A context menu will open.
  2. From the context menu, select Display Like Firefox.
